content: gelato water bottle bag gauge 12 rounds of single_crochet in the round = 10 cm 4 in in diameter materials sport weight yarn scraps 3 mm hook notes end every round by slip stitching to the first st in the round chain 1 and chain 2 do not count as stitches in the sample colors are being changed every six row change colors by simply threading the loop of the new color through the loop of the old color videos single_crochet circle tutorial - https //youtu be/kfho_8nswgc measurements gelato water bottle bag fits water bottles with circumference of 25 cm for a different circumference it s recommended to change gauge abbreviations chain s - chain s skip - skip single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet st s - stitch es repeat - repeat slip_stitch - slip_stitch blo - back loop beginning of rounds it is recommended to place a stitch marker at the start of the wavy rounds place marker in the first st of the round pic 1 green marker - first st of wavy row yellow marker - first st of slip_stitch row slip_stitch you use to join in the round is your first slip_stitch pic 2 after doing the slip_stitch row you will make first double_crochet of next row in the marked st from second to last row you will crochet into two loops marked with the green marker + one loop in front of them pic 3 work 3 double_crochet in this marked st then move your st marker to mark first double_crochet of this row pic 1 pic 2 pic 3 instructions base round 1 start with a magic_ring make 6 single_crochet in magic_ring 6 sts round 2 make 2 single_crochet in each stitch around 12 sts round 3 make single_crochet increase then single_crochet in next stitch that is 2 single_crochet in 1st and 1 single_crochet in 2nd st repeat around 18 sts round 4 make single_crochet in first st single_crochet increase in 2nd st and single_crochet in 3rd st repeat around 24 sts round 5 make single_crochet increase 1 single_crochet 1 single_crochet 1 single_crochet repeat around 30 sts round 6 make 1 single_crochet 1 single_crochet single_crochet increase 1 single_crochet 1 single_crochet repeat around 36 sts round 7 single_crochet increase 5x single_crochet 42 sts round 8 3x single_crochet single_crochet increase 3x single_crochet 48 sts round 9 single_crochet increase 7x single_crochet 54 sts round 10 4x single_crochet single_crochet increase 4x single_crochet 60 sts sides round 1 chain 2 make 2 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 3 single_crochet 3 sl sts 3 single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet repeat all around round 2 slip_stitch in every st after the slip_stitch rounds crochet in the two back loops only be careful not to touch the braids you did with the slip stitches round 3 chain 3 make 3 double_crochet increase in the first stitch double_crochet in next 3 sts skip next st double_crochet in next st work a total of 4 times double_crochet in next 2 sts make
